summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5263 for the improvement of Empire Way, as established by Ordinance No. 55134, amended by Ordinance No. 57550, from Renton Avenue to the south city limits; paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 60866, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
